name: Make Money Calculator v1.0
author: Yoav Shalev

sections.description:
How to use:
Pick a date – sometime in the future.
Enter the amount of money you would like to make by this date.

The Make Money Calculator will automatically calculate how much money you need to make each second, minute, hour, day, week, month & year (when applicable) in order to reach this monetary goal.

You may also configure the way it looks (colors, size of border etc’.) in the widget area.

That’s it! Simple & Sweet ðŸ™‚

Be sure to check out:
PPC & Media Campaign ROI Calculator

Visit AffiliScore to keep up with the latest updates AffiliScore
sections.installation:
You can use the built in installer and upgrader, or you can install the plugin manually.

  1. You can either use the automatic plugin installer or your FTP program to upload it to your wp-content/plugins directory the top-level folder.
    Don’t just upload all the php files and put them in /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit your widgits area
  4. Configure any options as desired
  5. That’s it!
